page.title: 03Farming land
page.content: This is what you call a mixed farm. It has a north and east escarpment. Mr.Dee was born on the farm.His father worked there.He loved the land and had a love of the animals and he needed a lot of patience. You don't need a lot of qualifications in farming. Mr.Dee gets up at 6.00a.m.and goes to bed at 11.00p.m.He said the land was beautiful.He said that he lives in a nice spot and it was a healthy spot and it had lot of springs in the ground. Then Mrs Dee said they had found flints and arrow heads. So they took them to the Corinium Museum. The pond on his land is shown on all the maps.It is a fish pond. A man had a summer palace in Blockley it was bought for use in the summer.The farm has been recently modernised and is very old.
